title: Fragment, 1995-50-215, 1770–80
medium:
Block-printed on plain weave. 
Linen warp, cotton weft.
description: Stripe of a floral motif in straight repeat at the left. At the right an alternation of two figures; a woman playing on a  stringed instrument and a harlequin. Both appear to be on a stage. Black, two reds, lavender, blue and yellow ocher.
